mapper.select: SELECT num, comment_db.usercode, content, target_code, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, comment_db.regdate, users_db.id, users_db.nickname FROM comment_db INNER JOIN users_db ON comment_db.usercode = users_db.usercode WHERE ref_group = #{ref_group} ORDER BY comment_group DESC, comment_db.regdate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_db (num, usercode, content, target_code, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES (#{num}, #{usercode}, #{content}, #{target_code}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
